tool_description: Measures water pH levels using digital or strip methods to assess acidity/alkalinity, which affects treatment effectiveness and indicates potential contamination.

sample_id.description: Unique identifier of the water sample being tested

test_method.description: Testing method: digital_meter, litmus_strips, or indicator_drops

temperature_celsius.description: Water temperature in Celsius (affects pH readings)

error_messages: Invalid test method: Must be one of [digital_meter, litmus_strips, indicator_drops]
Temperature out of range: Water temperature must be between 0°C and 50°C
Sample contaminated: Sample shows signs of contamination that affect pH measurement
Calibration required: Digital meter needs calibration before use
usage: Provide sample ID, choose test method, and record water temperature. Ensure digital meters are calibrated. Take multiple readings for accuracy.

ph_classification.description: Classification as acidic, neutral, or alkaline

potability_status.description: Whether pH is within safe drinking range

measurement_accuracy.description: Accuracy level based on test method used
